description: Document two utility files in coderef-docs/coderef/ directory: timestamp.py (7.3K) for generating RSMS v2.0 and UDS-compliant timestamps with functions get_date(), get_timestamp(), get_iso_timestamp(); and remove-emojis.py (6.2K) CLI tool for stripping emojis from markdown/text files with dry-run, recursive processing, and custom pattern support
goal: Provide comprehensive documentation for these utility functions to improve discoverability and ease of use for developers working with the coderef-docs system
requirements: Document timestamp.py functions with parameter descriptions and return values
Document remove-emojis.py CLI arguments and usage examples
Explain RSMS v2.0 and UDS timestamp format compliance
Show practical examples for both utilities
Include error handling and edge cases
constraints: Follow existing documentation patterns in coderef-docs
